name: Animated models of General mix
description:
The version 0.4 is a merge of heitai3+veela10+fsV12.

Version 1.0 is a combination of heitai4+veela11+fsV12.

By adjusting the tag, 2D and 2.5D styles can be produced. Simultaneous use of three triggering words is necessary for creating a 2.5D image, whilst no triggering words are required for the default 2D animation output.

Creating images exceeding an aspect ratio of 16:9 or 9:16 is discouraged due to the potential for serious distortion.

We recommend the use of Anything VAE and DPM++ 2M SDE Karras Sampling method for image generation.

Resolutions over 768px should be avoided.

Adding 'Bad hands' is recommended to reduce the likelihood of undesirable outcomes. The use of any magnifying plugins for enlargement is not recommended.

Typically, utilizing 'img2img' with 'R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B' provides this model with performance surpassing that of 'Hires. fix'.

Link to the model used for synthesis:

https://civitai.com/models/12606/meinahentai
https://civitai.com/models/68025/veela
https://civitai.com/models/91864/fs-v12

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
It is a combination of heitai4+veela11+fsV12, using updated materials compared to the 0.4 version.

By adjusting the tags, you can generate both 2D and 2.5D styles. To generate a 2.5D image, three trigger words need to be used simultaneously, while no trigger words are required for the default 2D animation style.

It is not recommended to generate images with an aspect ratio exceeding 16:9 or 9:16, as it may result in severe distortion.

It is recommended to use Anything VAE and DPM++ 2M SDE Karras Sampling method for image generation.

The resolution should not exceed 768px.

It is advisable to add Bad hands-5 to reduce the probability of bad results. Avoid using any magnification plugins.

Typically, img2img using R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B can provide better results than Hires. fix.

Link to the model used for synthesis:

https://civitai.com/models/12606/meinahentai
https://civitai.com/models/68025/veela
https://civitai.com/models/91864/fs-v12

If you take a close look, you will find that this model is remarkably tidy and does not come from repeated iterations or merges, and is not especially prone to crashing.

It is a synthesis of heitai3+veela10+fsV12.

By adjusting the tags, you can generate styles in both 2D and 2.5D. To generate a 2.5D style, it requires simultaneous usage of three trigger words, while no trigger words are needed for creating the default 2D animation style.

It is discouraged to generate images with an aspect ratio exceeding 16:9 or 9:16, as this would lead to severe distortions. We recommend using Anything VAE and DPM++ 2M SDE Karras Sampling method for image generation.

The resolutions should not exceed 768px.

It's advised to add Bad hands-5 to lower the chances of unintended outcomes.

It is not recommended to use any magnifying plugins to enlarge the image.

Typically, executing img2img using R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B can yield better results than Hires. fix
